trans-unit.source: A tool to simulate combat in AD&D 2nd Edition
trans-unit.target: AD＆D 2nd Edition中的模拟战斗工具

trans-unit.source: Add all details about the combatants into the combatants.yaml file. The example combatants.example.yaml illustrates the syntax
trans-unit.target: 将所有关于战斗人员的详细信息添加到 combatants.yaml 文件中。combatants.example.yaml示例说明了语法。

trans-unit.source: Rate of fire can be a number of attacks/shots per round (e.g. 2 or 3) or a ratio of attacks/shots per round (2/1 or 3/2). Default is 1/1.
trans-unit.target: 射速可以是每轮攻击/射击的次数(如2或3)或每轮攻击/射击的比率(2/1或3/2)。默认为1/1。

trans-unit.source: The AD&D Second edition Combat Simulator will run simple simulated battles to determine the statistical likelyhood of success or failure by the party. The simulator does not account for player creativity and uses a very simple method to determine how the battle will go.
trans-unit.target: AD＆D第二版战斗模拟器将进行简单的模拟战斗，以确定该方成功或失败的统计可能性。该模拟器不考虑玩家的创造力，而是使用一种非常简单的方法来确定战斗的进行方式。

trans-unit.source: The BATTLES argument indicates how many times to simulate the battle. Default is 1.
trans-unit.target: BATTLES参数表示模拟战斗的次数。默认为1。

trans-unit.source: The hit dice of the monster. This can be a traditional Hit Die number (e.g. 3) which is the number of 1d8 dice to roll to determine the monsters hit points, or it can be a traditional Hit Die number with a modifier (e.g. 3 + 2), or it can just be a description of dice and modifiers (e.g. 1d6 + 2 or 2d8)
trans-unit.target: 怪物的命中点数。这可以是一个传统的命中点数(如3),也就是用1d8的骰子来决定怪物的命中点数,也可以是一个传统的命中点数加上一个修饰符(如3+2),也可以只是一个骰子和修饰符的描述(如1d6+2或2d8)。

trans-unit.source: The number of the given type of monster to include in the battle.
trans-unit.target: 给定类型的怪物的数量,以纳入战斗。

trans-unit.source: The values in the AC dictionary are added together to detemrine the AC. For example a shield would have an AC value of 1 because it reduces AC by 1. Studded leather would have a value of 3 because it gives AC 7. If a combatant had both (3 + 1), their AC would be 6. Default is no modifier or AC 10.
trans-unit.target: AC字典中的数值加在一起就可以确定AC值。例如,盾牌的AC值为1,因为它可以减少1个AC值;带钉的皮革的AC值为3,因为它可以提供7个AC值。如果一个战斗人员同时拥有(3+1),他们的AC值将是6。默认是没有修改器或AC 10。

trans-unit.source: The values in the To Hit dictionary are added together to determine the total modifier for the to hit role. For example if a fighter specialized in a bastard sword and had a magical bastard sword +1, the 1 from specialization and 1 from magic would be added to the d20 die roll. Default is no modifier.
trans-unit.target: 致命字典中的数值相加,决定了致命角色的总修饰值。例如,如果一个战士专攻私生子剑,并且有一把魔法私生子剑+1,那么来自专攻的1和来自魔法的1将被加到d20的骰子上。默认为无修改器。

trans-unit.source: This can either be a string or a dictionary. If it’s a string it applies to targets of all sizes. If it’s a dictionary the size of the target is mapped to a damage string.
trans-unit.target: 它可以是字符串，也可以是字典。如果是字符串，则适用于所有大小的目标。如果是字典，目标的大小将映射到损坏字符串。

trans-unit.source: This list contains all the possible attacks a combatant might use.
trans-unit.target: 这个列表包含了一个战斗人员可能使用的所有攻击。

trans-unit.source: This list enumerates the attacks that the combatant will use. The values are the names of the attacks in the attacks section. Each combatant uses all of their attacks each round. For example a monster with an attack list of “claw”, “claw”, “bite” would make all 3 attacks in a single round.
trans-unit.target: 该列表列举了战斗人员将要使用的攻击。这些值是“攻击”部分中的攻击名称。每个战斗员每回合都使用所有攻击。例如，一个攻击列表为“爪”，“爪”，“咬”的怪物将在一个回合中进行全部3次攻击。

trans-unit.source: file with the players and monsters information. The example combatants.example.yaml file included in the package is a good place to start.
trans-unit.target: 文件中包含玩家和怪物的信息。软件包中包含的示例fighterants.example.yaml文件是一个很好的起点。
